name: Cricket
overview: The game can either by played by two humans or as a human against computer contest. You can also decide whether to play over 10, 20 or 40 overs. The screen displays a view of the cricket pitch along the wicket from the bowler's end. The characters consist of four fielders, two batsmen, the bowler and a wicket keeper. When playing against the computer, you will always bowl first. You are allowed a choice of three types of bowler - slow, fast and spinner. A spinner will curve in flight as would be expected. The game also featured on the 1987 Bug-Byte Compilation II disk along with Hunkidory, Ice Hockey and Jack Attac.
